attributes.background: Taking away one of just three drag strips in the uk, we feel this will push people to use the streets as a race track instead of legal sites that are being closed down, a lot like grimley raceway we all had to petition for in order to keep. The uk motorsport market brings millions to the economy.

rejection.details:
This doesn't seem to be something that the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

Depending on the reasons for the closure of the raceway, this may be something your local council could help you with. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
